name: 'Hartsfield's Landing' Multiple Choice Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What kind of game did the President bring Sam and Toby from India?
questions.explanation:
Chess.

	President Bartlet told Toby he stole them when they left the Prime Minister's palace.

questions.text: In what state is the fictional Hartsfield's Landing?
questions.explanation:
New Hampshire.

	Forty-two out of sixty-five people vote in the fictional Hartsfield's Landing and they vote at one minute after midnight on the day of the New Hampshire primary.

questions.text: The Flenders took Josh in and fed him the last time they were in Hartsfield's Landing.
questions.explanation:
False.

	It was Donna that the Flenders took in and fed. Josh knew they were going to vote for Governor Ritchie so he had Donna call to persuade them to vote for Bartlet. It was cold outside so Donna took Josh's coat to wear while she made the calls because his coat was warmer.

questions.text: Who went to get the pizzas they ordered while they waited for the voting in Hartsfield's Landing to start?
questions.explanation:
CJ.

	When CJ entered the White House from getting the pizzas, her card was switched with Charlie's card, so it went off causing the Secret Service to keep her from going any further. This was the second thing that happened in the feud between Charlie and CJ that night.

questions.text: "I don't really want to know what he's going to find in his _________________, do you?"
questions.explanation:
Filing cabinet.

	Ed and Larry were outside the Oval Office when they heard CJ tell Charlie he could find it filed 'A' for anal. CJ was referring to the President's private schedule that CJ signed out.

questions.text: Who was Toby talking to when he said, "I forgot for a second that you were hilarious"?
questions.explanation:
President Bartlet.

	The President told Toby that Stanley Keyworth blamed the President's problems on Toby. Toby apologized and the President said he was kidding. This is when Toby made the comment.

questions.text: What object in CJ's office did Charlie glue together?
questions.explanation:
Phone.

	CJ was going to call ahead to order pizzas. She lifted the receiver and ended up pulling the whole phone up. Charlie had crazy-glued the phone together.

questions.text: Which daughter did the President say had mastered her multiplication tables in third grade?
questions.explanation:
Ellie.

	Toby was telling the President that Abbey had told him a story of how Jed had just won the Nobel Prize for Economics and was telling the King of Sweden about Ellie learning her multiplication tables.

questions.text: Which country was going to test three Patriot missiles?
questions.explanation:
Taiwan.

	Taiwan was getting ready to have their first free elections and China didn't like it so they were going to fire on them missiles. By the end of the episode, China decided to stop the war games and Taiwan agreed to test only one Patriot.

questions.text: Who did the President call Sigmund?
questions.explanation:
Toby.

	After writing the note 'Sigmund, come play chess', the President realized it wasn't really a funny joke.
